mapper.select: select * from joa_schedule where sch_city = #{city} and sch_branch = #{branch} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate+7,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select distinct sch_dayd from joa_schedule where sch_city = #{sch_city} and sch_branch = #{sch_branch} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(sysdate+7,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by sch_dayd asc

select distinct b.mov_rate as rate, a.sch_mov_title as subject, b.mov_genre as genre, b.mov_running_time as runningtime, to_char(b.mov_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as sdate from joa_schedule a, joa_movie b where a.sch_branch = #{sch_branch} and to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{sch_dayd} and a.sch_mov_title = b.mov_title and to_char(sysdate,'hh24') <= sch_start_hour and to_char(sysdate,'mi') <= sch_start_min

select sch_mov_title,sch_theater, sch_start_hour, sch_start_min, sch_end_hour, sch_end_min from joa_schedule where sch_branch = #{sch_branch} and to_char(sch_dayd,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{sch_dayd} and sch_start_hour > to_char(sysdate,'hh24') and sch_start_min > to_char(sysdate,'mi') order by sch_start_hour asc
